meanings.definition: A genetic disorder characterized by the growth of tumors along nerves in the skin, brain, and other parts of the body.
meanings.sent1: Neurofibromatoses can cause tumors to develop on nerves in various areas of the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying ways to treat neurofibromatoses effectively.
meanings.sent3: The neurofibromatoses decided to throw a party on the nerves, but the brain cells weren't invited.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a tangled web of neurofibromatoses, each thought a tumor growing along a nerve.
meanings.sent5: The image of neurofibromatoses creeping along nerves like tiny invaders stuck in my memory.
